::SnowCat::

She fired her optics lazars at him.  She backed up while firing and 
was closer to the center of the clearing.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Ramulus/DeathScythe::
> 
> Ramulus stops on the other side of the clearing from SnowCat. He 
could see 
> DeathScythe circling above. The Maximal transforms into robot mode, 
aiming 
> his gun carefully at the assassin.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> DeathScythe spins around, his scanner detecting a Maximal signature 
in the 
> clearing. He laughs. He had overestimated the bot, it had gone to 
the 
> clearing.
> 
> The assassin cuts some of the power in his jets, lowering his 
altitude 
> rapidly and heading for the clearing.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Ramulus narrows his eyes as he sees DeathScythe getting closer to 
the 
> clearing. 3... 2... 1....
> 
> "Hit him with everything you've got, now!" he says into his comm-
link, firing 
> four shouts from his gun at DeathScythe.
